tasc_safetycheck1.Description: Have you or a first-degree family member (parent, sibling, child) ever suffered from seizures?

tasc_safetycheck2.Description: Do you have any metal in your body such as an infusion pump, pacemaker, metal or shrapnel in the body, deep brain stimulator, aneurysm clip, metal prostheses, joints, rods or plates?

tasc_safetycheck3.Description: Do you have a history of skin disease (for example: blistering or skin cancer on the head)?

tasc_safetycheck4.Description: Have you ever been diagnosed with a psychiatric disorder such as mania, schizophrenia or other psychosis?

tasc_safetycheck5.Description: Are you on medications used to treat psychosis or other psychiatric conditions?
